title: Hi there
body:
My accaunt get this account has been permanently suspended       
                                                          
Please help me  and how many time i need to wait for get my accaunt back please help me

Please help me

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and we'd like to help you out individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Reach out to us there, and we'll provide more context.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
